title: News24.com | Coronavirus in SA: Impasse over evacuation of British citizens
description: Thousands of UK citizens are stranded in South Africa but the government refuses to relax lockdown regulations to allow the European country's crews to rest before returning home.
content:
Thousands of UK citizens are believed to be in distress while they are stranded in South Africa but the government refuses to relax lockdown regulations to allow the European country's crews to rest before returning home.
"South Africa has been clear that it… [+3000 chars]
